ItemTooltips.gauntlets: Gives HP and damage early on.
ItemTooltips.flask: Gives HP regen when you are low.
ItemTooltips.tango: Helps heal you if you get harassed.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Good aura lifesteal if you get another UAM or want more lifesteal.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Good item early on for more HP damage and Mana regen. Active heals you and your team.
ItemTooltips.assault: Gives good armor and attack speed and has a good aura.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Allows you to kill everyone unimpeded.
ItemTooltips.vanguard: Good early if you need HP and damage block.
ItemTooltips.manta: Gives you even more illusions for good DPS.
ItemTooltips.armlet: Gives great stats and damage, use it before you use your ultimate to makes your illusions more powerful.
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: Gives damage and attack speed and HP. Disassemble it later to make Heavens Halberd and Manta Style.
ItemTooltips.satanic: More lifesteal and lots of HP and damage.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: Gives you good bonuses and lifesteal.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Gives good stats and movespeed, aura helps the team.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Gives you HP damage and evasion. Use the active to disarm enemy carries.

AbilityTooltips.chaos_knight_chaos_bolt: Very good stun, use it to stop and kill enemies.
AbilityTooltips.chaos_knight_reality_rift: Allows you to pull enemies to you, use it to stop them from running or to initiate.
AbilityTooltips.chaos_knight_chaos_strike: Gives you crits for more damage.
AbilityTooltips.chaos_knight_phantasm: Gives you illusions that do lots of damage. Use this during team fights to kill everyone. Not good until you have more levels and get more illusions.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: Take these when you have no other choices.
